data.name: Net Knight
data.detailed_description:
Create and control your very own digital hero, or "Net Knight"! These Knights are specially programmed to securely transfer data, delete MalWare, and virtually assist their operators (you the player). Knights reside inside their own custom homepages, and travel various networks to complete tasks, battle viruses and other Knights, and upgrade their own power levels, to better assist their operators.

Lately however, some networks have reported unusual MalWare activity, new forms of viruses, and unexplained outages. Your Net Knight will need to overcome these cycle-to-cycle challenges while assisting friends with digital punks, NFT scams, out-of-control forum moderators, hackers, and even more devious schemes that could threaten the very fabric of the Net!





Net Knight features grid-based combat that should be familiar to MMBN fans. Use your trusty VarShot and VarTool to wear down enemy health, then finish them off with powerful BattleWare card combos!





Explore a mix of hand-crafted and procedurally generated levels! Net Knight allows players to venture into the internet like never before, with levels automatically created based on website data. Color scheme, layout, NPCs, and enemies all change depending on the website that is currently being "browsed". Links to other websites are represented as in-game warps that allow the player to traverse the entire internet without limits!





Players can customize many aspects of their Knight, with over 80,000,000 unique combinations! WearWare outfit options include separate choices for Boots, Gloves, Suits, Backpieces, Helmet, Visor, and Custom headpiece. In addition, each Knight's face and eyes can be personalized!

Players can also upgrade their Knight via CustWare. Select your VarShot, VarTool, Armor, and Boots loadout, then choose an element for each. Finally, assign your MemSlots to various upgrade options that increase your offense, defense, speed, or general utility! As you level up and explore, you'll unlock more CustWare options and upgrades!





Collect cards by defeating enemies, purchasing from shopkeepers, trading with other Knights, or acquiring from treasure data. Select cards from your Library to form your Battle Folder, which will be randomly shuffled and drawn from during battle. Create a deck with similar code synergy, complimentary elements, defensive utility, or overwhelming offense. The choice is yours!

data.short_description: Delete MalWare, collect cards, customize your digital hero, and explore an infinite procedural world based on the "real" net. Inspired by the Battle Network series, experience an Action-RPG offering a unique story, colorful characters, grid-based combat, and an infinite digital world to explore!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
